import React, {useState} from 'react' import {Card, Form, Button} from 'react-bootstrap'; export default function LoginForm() { const[empid,setEmpid] = useState(''); const[password,setPassword] = useState(''); const[keepMeLoggedIn, setKeepMeLoggedIn] = useState('true'); return ( Login to your account
setEmpid(e.target.value)}/>
setPassword(e.target.value)}/>
setKeepMeLoggedIn(!e.target.value)}/>
) }
